程序包 net.opentsdb.auth

  • 接口概要 
    接口 说明
    Authentication
    A plugin interface for performing authentication for OpenTSDB API access.
    Authorization
    A plugin interface for authorization calls, allowing or disallowing operations in OpenTSDB.
    AuthState
    An interface for use in authentication and authorization of calls.
  • 类概要 
    类 说明
    AllowAllAuthenticatingAuthorizer
    The default authentication and authorization plugin.
    AuthenticationChannelHandler
    This is a simple authentication handler that intercepts the initial calls for a new channel and attempts to authenticate the caller.
    Roles
    Suggested standard Roles for OpenTSDB Users
  • 枚举概要 
    枚举 说明
    AuthState.AuthStatus
    A list of various authentication and authorization states.
    Permissions
    The Permissions used within the OpenTSDB Code.
